1.1.0.name: com.unity.services.moderation
1.1.0.description: Unity Moderation makes toxicity-management accessible, impactful, and insightful. The service providing developers with the tools they need to grow and maintain healthy communities within their games.

_upm.changelog:
### Changed
- Updated the minimum supported Editor version to 2021.3.
- Updated player cache duration to 60 min to match Safe text in the moderation dashboard
### Removed
 - Removed Safevoice mentions as the service is being discontinued.

1.0.1.name: com.unity.services.moderation
1.0.1.description: Unity Moderation makes toxicity-management accessible, impactful, and insightful. The service providing developers with the tools they need to grow and maintain healthy communities within their games.

_upm.changelog:
### Bugfix
- Fixed a bug where package compilation would fail if Vivox is used alongside Moderation

1.0.0-pre.3.name: com.unity.services.moderation
1.0.0-pre.3.description: Unity Moderation aims to make toxicity-management accessible, impactful, and insightful – providing developers with the tools they need to grow and maintain healthy communities within their games..

_upm.changelog:
### Added
 - Added Apple Privacy Manifest
### Bugfix
- Fixed a bug where Package initialization would crash if Vivox was part of the project dependencies.

1.0.0-pre.2.name: com.unity.services.moderation
1.0.0-pre.2.description: Unity Moderation aims to make toxicity-management accessible, impactful, and insightful – providing developers with the tools they need to grow and maintain healthy communities within their games..

_upm.changelog:
### Bugfix
 - Lowered minimum Vivox-Unity dependency to 16.0.0-pre.1 for automatic Vivox information collection.

1.0.0-pre.1.name: com.unity.services.moderation
1.0.0-pre.1.description: Unity Moderation aims to make toxicity-management accessible, impactful, and insightful – providing developers with the tools they need to grow and maintain healthy communities within their games..

_upm.changelog:
### Report Creation revamped
- Report is now created through the Moderation instance.
- Report now contains the vivox informations (and channels) that will be sent to the service, allowing for the game developer to alter it.
